Class Temporizador

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.VBox
es.ieslosmontecillos.javadoc.Temporizador
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Temporizador extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox
Temporizador is a component to countdown time. It shows the countdown of the time passed as parameter and sends an alert the moment it reaches the end.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shihan Wei
